title: Evolve IP Listed in Inc. Magazines 2015 Inc. 500|5000
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/3/2015 @ 12:21 PM   Evolve IP 
WAYNE, Pa., Sept. 3, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Evolve IP , The Cloud Services Company(TM), today announced that Inc. magazine has recognized it in the 34(th) annual Inc. 500|5000, an exclusive listing of the nation's fastest-growing private companies. The list will be unveiled in the September issue of Inc.Founded in 2007, Evolve IP is one of the nation's leading cloud services companies with more than 1,300 commercial business accounts, representing more than 6,100 locations and 80,000 managed end-points and users across the globe. As a member of the Inc. 500, Evolve IP joins technology pioneers such as Microsoft, Intuit, Oracle, and many others that have gained this recognition.One of the nation's fastest growing cloud companies, Evolve IP provides cloud services to some of the world's best known brands in virtually every major industry including: healthcare, legal, insurance, banking, technology, travel and retail. The company's Evolve IP OneCloud(TM) solution allows organizations to migrate multiple cloud computing and cloud communications services onto a single, unified platform including: virtual data centers/servers , virtual desktops , unified communications , disaster recovery , contact centers , and more."We are very pleased to be listed in the Inc. 500/5000 for the third time, and it's a great tribute to the dedicated and talented team we have across the country," said Thomas Gravina , Chairman, Chief Executive Officer, and Co-Founder of Evolve IP. "We have achieved significant and material growth since our inception in 2007 and our continued innovation in the cloud will continue to drive new market and growth opportunities for the company going forward.""The story of this year's Inc. 5000 is the story of great leadership. In an incredibly competitive business landscape, it takes something extraordinary to take your company to the top," says Inc. President and Editor-In-Chief Eric Schurenberg. "You have to remember that the average company on the Inc. 5000 grew nearly six-fold since 2012. Business owners don't achieve that kind of success by accident."In addition to being named to this year's Inc. 500|5000, Evolve IP and its leadership team have received numerous nationally recognized honors. These credits include: being named as a 2015 Red Herring Top 100, getting noted as "Best-of-Breed" by Gartner, and winning numerous product awards across the company's entire cloud services suite. For an up-to-date list of Evolve IP's honors and awards please click here. For more information about Evolve IP please visit: www.evolveip.net ABOUT EVOLVE IP Evolve IP is The Cloud Services Company(TM). Designed from the beginning to provide organizations with a unified option for cloud services, Evolve IP enables decision-makers to migrate all or select IT technologies to its award-winning cloud platform. Evolve IP's combination of security, stability, scalability, and lower total cost of ownership is fundamentally superior to outdated legacy systems and other cloud offerings. Today, approximately 80,000 users across the globe depend daily on Evolve IP for cloud services like virtual servers, virtual desktops, disaster recovery, unified communications, contact centers, and more. Visit www.EvolveIP.net or http://blog.EvolveIP.net .
